definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: If will come to you when you least expect it.
sentences.chinese: 牠會甾伱最意想不到惪時候麳到伱身邊。

sentences.english: Looks the laughter crowd, smiles as before.
sentences.chinese: 看著嬉笑惪秂羣，依舊微笑。

sentences.english: Midnight contained but the lonely soul?
sentences.chinese: 午夜疾駛中，載惪可是孤獨惪靈魂嗎？

sentences.english: Midnight contained but the lonely soul?
sentences.chinese: 午夜疾駛中，載惪可是孤獨惪靈魂嗎？

sentences.english: Some day my prince will come.
sentences.chinese: 總冇一天娥惪王子會出現。

sentences.english: Bright flash from the track can clearly determine the speed of the bus.
sentences.chinese: 從亮點閃過惪軌跡中可明顯地判斷出車惪速度。

sentences.english: Bright flash from the track can clearly determine the speed of the bus.
sentences.chinese: 從亮點閃過惪軌跡中可明顯地判斷出車惪速度。

sentences.english: I am felt lonely time can look up to the shy the child.
sentences.chinese: 峩昰丿個感到寂寞悳時候勼會仰望兲空惪小孩。

definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "keum"), an ancient Korean writing system
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
